name: Dennis MADDREY, Appellant, v. Dandra GORNIAK, Sci-Albion Inmate Accountant and Philadelphia County Clerk of Courts, Appellees

parties: Dennis MADDREY, Appellant, v. Dandra GORNIAK, Sci-Albion Inmate Accountant and Philadelphia County Clerk of Courts, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of June, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Martha Gale, Administrative Office of Pennsylvania Courts, for Philadelphia County Clerk of Courts.
Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Chase M. Defelice, PA Office of General Counsel, for Dandra Gorniak.
casebody.head_matter:
116 A.3d 1103
Dennis MADDREY, Appellant, v. Dandra GORNIAK, Sci-Albion Inmate Accountant and Philadelphia County Clerk of Courts, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 15, 2015.
Dennis Madrey, Pro Se.
Martha Gale, Administrative Office of Pennsylvania Courts, for Philadelphia County Clerk of Courts.
Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Chase M. Defelice, PA Office of General Counsel, for Dandra Gorniak.
